[[Kosei Shibasaki|Shibasaki]] {{goal|78}}|stadium = [[Yurtec Stadium Sendai]]|location = [[Sendai]]|attendance = 14,486|referee = Takuto Okabe|result = W|stack = yes}}{{2016 J1 League table|showteam=SFR}}{{Fb_rs |hw=7 |hd=3 |hl=4 |hgf=25 |hga=15 |aw=6 |ad=4 |al=3 |agf=25|aga=15}}{{Fb_rs_footer |u=28 August 2016|s=[[#Matches|Competitive matches]] |date=August 2016}}{{main|2016 AFC Champions League}} Sanfrecce Hiroshima qualified for the Group Stage of the 2016 AFC Champions League by winning the 2015 J1 League. They were drawn in Group F along with China's Shandong Luneng Taishan, Korean outfit FC Seoul, and Buriram United from Thailand. Sanfrecce Hiroshima were automatically eliminated on 20 April after a 1-0 loss against Shandong Luneng Taishan, making a four-point gap with one game left.{{main|2016 AFC Champions League group stage}}{{:2016 AFC Champions League group stage|transcludesection=Group F|showteam=HIR}}{{legend2|#CCFFCC|Win|border=1px solid #AAAAAA}}{{legend2|#FFFFCC|Draw|border=1px solid #AAAAAA}}{{legend2|#FFCCCC|Loss|border=1px solid #AAAAAA}}{{legend2|#FFFFFF|Upcoming fixture|border=1px solid #AAAAAA}}{{football box collapsible| date = {{Start date|2016|2|23|df=y}}| time = 19:00 [[UTC+09:00|UTC+9]]| team1 = Sanfrecce Hiroshima {{flagicon|JPN}}| score = 1–2| team2 = {{flagicon|CHN}} [[Shandong Luneng Taishan F.C.|Shandong Luneng]]| report = [http://www.the-afc.com/afcasfeeds?fixtureid=9953&stageid=391&tMode=H&view=ajax&show=matchsummary Report]| goals1 = [[Kohei Shimizu|Shimizu]] {{goal|64}}| goals2 = [[Yang Xu]] {{yel|32}} {{goal|67}}
